episodes.title: Horror Stories From My Fundamentalist Youth Group
episodes.description:
My youth group was better than most, and still incredibly traumatic.

Join FFRF to protect the separation of church and state:
https://ffrf.org/misc-for-landing-pages/join-the-freedom-of-religion-foundation-today/





Support the Atheist Community of Austin:
https://www.zeffy.com/en-US/donation-form/donate-today-43

Support Equality Texas:
https://equalitytexas.org/give/501c3/



My second channel: https://www.youtube.com/@Drewschannel0




SUPPORT

https://www.bartehrman.com/gms/






Resources for atheists in need


Find a Secular Therapist: https://www.seculartherapy.org

Recovering from Religion helps connect those who are leaving or have left their religion with support, resources and community: https://www.recoveringfromreligion.org/#rfr-welcome

Resources for Ex-Mu’s: https://exmuslims.org/our-resources/




Chapters:
00:00 Intro










This video contains 100% therapeutic grade skepticism.*
